==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|いち|しょ|k1=いっ|yomi=o}}

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|いっしょ|y=o|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Adjectival noun===
{{ja-adj|いっしょ|infl=na}}

# [[combined]], [[merged]], [[unified]]

====Inflection====
{{ja-na|一緒|いっしょ}}

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|別別|べつべつ}}: separated

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|いっしょ}}
# [[combination]]; a state which is combined
# [[meeting]]

===Usage notes===
* 一緒 is most often used adverbally with the particle [[に]] as [[一緒に]]. Refer to the [[一緒に]] ("[[together]] with") page for more information.
